2024: Events and Highlights

A Year of Connection and Growth ðŸŒŸ

This year, R-Ladies Rome celebrated another fantastic journey of learning, collaboration, and empowerment. From interactive workshops to insightful talks, our events focused on R programming, data science, and technology, fostering a vibrant community of learners and professionals.

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to our amazing speakers, including Hadley Wickham (in collaboration with R-Ladies NYC), Torin White (in collaboration with R-Ladies Paris), Paula Moraga, and many more, for sharing their expertise.

Revisit the highlights of our past events! Relive thought-provoking discussions, hands-on workshops, and inspiring presentations that defined our gatherings. Whether youâ€™re a beginner or an experienced R user, thereâ€™s always something new to discover. Watch the recordings and be inspired by the incredible insights shared by our speakers and community members.

A big thank you to our engaged community for your enthusiasm and support, which made each event truly memorable.

Missed a session or need presentation materials? ðŸ“® Reach out to us at rome@rladies.org.

Letâ€™s carry this energy and passion into 2025 as we continue to learn and grow together. Thank you for being an essential part of R-Ladies Rome! ðŸ’œ
